alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Waller; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A nearly stationary strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Colorado, north central Wharton, southeastern Austin, west central Fort Bend and southwestern Waller Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sealy, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sealy, Wallis, Simonton and San Felipe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Waller; Wharton
